mapper.insert: insert into comments(post_id, content, writer_id) values(#{post_id}, #{content}, #{writer_id} )
mapper.select: select c.id, c.post_id, c.content, c.created_at, u.nick_name from comments c join users u on c.writer_id = u.id where c.deleted = false and c.post_id = #{0}
mapper.update: update comments set content = #{content}, updated_at = now() where id = #{id}
update comments set deleted = true, updated_at = now() where id = #{id}
